name: Avoid synonym with both private & PUBLIC Definition in PL/SQL context
description: This metric retrieves synonyms  that have two definitions: one private and one public
output:
This report lists all the synonyms with two definitions
It provides the following information:
The ordered list of all synonyms that have both private & PUBLIC definition. The name of each synonym that is part of  the  full name.
rationale: Presence of a synonym with several definitions induces code complexity.
remediation: Reconsider the use of synonym with multiple definitions: One idea could be to rename one of them
total: The total procedure counts the number of synonyms that are part of the analyzed source code
